display_long_description:
**Visit real caves - like legendary Nutty Putty (with audio guide by rescuer Brandon Kowallis!) - and fictional ones, with each offering different kind of challenge! Step into the underground world in the most realistic spelunking game, where the entire environment is your map, just waiting to be discovered!**

🏋️‍♀️Beat steep climbs, tight tunnels and giant chasms!
[media]

🔦Adjust your flashlight to uncover the secrets hidden in the dark

🚩Mark your own clues on cave walls with chalk

🔨Clear your path of obstacles with a hammer
[media]

⛏️Climb walls and ceilings (!) using ice axes
[media]
🎫Visit the legendary Nutty Putty Cave, meticulously recreated in VR with the help of experts.

👨‍🔧Maintain your gear to ensure its reliability
[media]

👀 No cheap horror tricks – just a mysterious and immersive cave atmosphere
[media]
🧗🏼‍♂️Try new Arcade Mode: race against time as you climb, swing, and scramble your way through challenging routes — hitting every checkpoint.

🧑🏻‍🤝‍🧑🏻Get more and more content with frequent game updates (multiplayer coming soon!).
